amendment.description: An amendment numbered 72 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to prevent the closing or continuous closing of offices of the Farm Service Agency, including any such offices still on a closed or hybrid schedule related to COVID-19.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crawford amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crawford amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crawford amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
